title: Permanently suspended For No Reason
body: my account chimpmonkey10 has been permanently suspended and i don't know why and i have received no email.  i would really either like my account back or know why it has been suspended. im sorry for whatever i did and sorry for the inconvenience. thank you

replies.body: I went ahead and took a look at the account. There are some billing issues going on within this account, so you will need to [Ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)our billing team for more information.
